alert.note: Alert for Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 6:27PM CDT until April 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR SOUTHEASTERN STONE... INDEPENDENCE...SOUTHEASTERN IZARD...CENTRAL JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN CLEBURNE...SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHERN SHARP COUNTIES IS CANCELLED... The storms which prompted the warning have moved out of a portion of the warned area. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However small hail and gusty winds are still possible with these thunderstorms. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for north central Arkansas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for Independence, Izard, Jackson, Cleburne, Lawrence, and Sharp counties.
